name: User
description: A user is a record of a user of the application.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique identifier for the user.

fields.name: first_name
fields.description: The first name of the user.

fields.name: last_name
fields.description: The last name of the user.

fields.name: email
fields.description: The email of the user.

fields.name: phone
fields.description: The phone number of the user.

fields.name: address
fields.description: The address of the user.

fields.name: city
fields.description: The city of the user.

fields.name: state
fields.description: The state of the user.

fields.name: zip_code
fields.description: The zip code of the user.

fields.name: country
fields.description: The country of the user.

fields.name: document_type
fields.description: The type of document the user has.

fields.name: document_file
fields.description: The file of the document the user has.

name: Admin
description: An admin is a record of an admin of the application. It can be a super admin or an admin.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique identifier for the admin.

fields.name: first_name
fields.description: The first name of the admin.

fields.name: last_name
fields.description: The last name of the admin.

fields.name: email
fields.description: The email of the admin.

fields.name: phone
fields.description: The phone number of the admin.

name: SuperAdmin
description: A super admin is a record of a super admin of the application. There can only be one super admin.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique identifier for the super admin.

name: Transaction
description: A transaction is a record of a financial transaction between two parties. It can be a deposit, withdrawal, or transfer.

fields.name: id
fields.description: The unique identifier for the transaction.

fields.name: reference_number
fields.description: The reference number for the transaction.

fields.name: channel
fields.description: The channel through which the transaction was made.

name: Swap
description: A swap is a record of a swap transaction between two parties. It can be a swap from one currency to another.

name: KYC
description: A KYC is a record of a KYC transaction between a user and an admin. It can be a KYC for a user.

name: Wallet
description: A wallet is a record of a wallet of a user. It can be a wallet for a user.
